title: Jase and Carly: Summer Lovin'
description: Tattooed bad boy Jase declared his love for Carly. Will it be enough? Will they get to where they both desperately want to go? Will they ever stop arguing enough to enjoy the rewards of true love and not just hot sex in inappropriate places?In this novella we discover the driving force behind their relationship. Is it just sex or will they make it to forever?HOT end of summer beach read!
author: M.J. Fields
